abstract.t: This memo is complementary to [ARCH] and describes how a GMPLS control plane may be applied to the Provider Backbone Bridges Traffic Engineering (PBB-TE) [IEEE 802.1Qay] amendment to 802.1Q and how GMPLS can be used to configure VLAN-aware Ethernet switches in order to establish Ethernet point to point (P2P) and P2MP MAC switched paths and P2P/P2MP VID based trees. This document supports, but does not modify, the standard IEEE data.
